Package org.openhab.core.thing.events

Class ThingUpdatedEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.core.events.AbstractEvent
      • org.openhab.core.thing.events.AbstractThingRegistryEvent
        • org.openhab.core.thing.events.ThingUpdatedEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event
    public class ThingUpdatedEvent
extends AbstractThingRegistryEvent
    A ThingUpdatedEvent notifies subscribers that a thing has been updated. Thing updated events must be created with the ThingEventFactory.
    Author:
    Stefan Bu√üweiler - Initial contribution
